972150.name: Amaze VR - Rom Com Pack 1
972150.description:
New Amaze VR Interactive Movie DLC Pack


DLC Pack includes two romantic comedy 180° 3D VR Movies at a discounted price.

• Stuck in the Middle (117 min): You just got cheated on. It sucks. But it's time to move on... or is it? Dive into this hilarious series where you are stuck between your ex and the new girl.

• Long Distance Trip (112 min): You're Michael, unhappily married, and you time travel back to college for a second chance at true love—if you make the right choices.

Enjoy “Choose Your Own Adventure” experiences where you decide the course of the story!
972150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
